title: Was Ok at first
text: I used to go here alot when they first opened was a good place. Quality has seemed to drop off some but the staff is still friendly and greet you when you come in.

title: Walk down memory lane
text: I used to pig hunt on this property many years ago. Was a wonderful walk down memory lane on a gorgeous day to be in the park. Come here to get away and enjoy the beauty you won't be sorry.

title: Ouside Seating
text:
All outside seating at this time but they make it work. Food is still good but you lose the ambiance of a nice inside window seat

I this review was helpful please let me know.

title: Great getaway off the path
text:
This hotel is off the beaten path about a 15 min walk to the warf area but you will be tired. A closer walk to Dennis the Menace park Very clean and comfortable at a low price. Worth a stay a time or two you won't be sorry.

Don't forget your AAA card for discounts

I this review was helpful please let me know.

title: Great room with a view
text: Stayed her for only one night but sure wish it was longer. We have a great room with a balcony view and the evening air was wonderful. Very romantic with the fireplace and the ocean breeze and the sound of the waves to lull you to sleep.

title: The best hands down.
text:
This review is a longtime coming. We booked a tour with Michael to see the history of the Apostle Paul's footsteps. But what we got was so much more!! Michael is a true Christian in even sense of the word. He loves Christ and loves to share his knowledge of the area. He will take you to places you never dreamed of and tell you all about each area. At the end of the tour we prayed and just had a good ol' fashioned Christian time. This was truly a wonderful experience with Michael. Thank you my dear friend and so sorry for taking so long to write this review for you. Steve, CiCi, Richard &Nancy Grandquist all send our love to you!

I this review was helpful please let me know.

title: This is the location you want
text: Hotel is nice and clean and the location is perfect to take off for a walk. Guard your personal belongs when walking in the city center but you will have a good time and this is the place to stay when in the area.

title: Take your time and enjoy!
text:
This is a must see place but give yourself at least 4-6 hours if you want to see all the rooms. This is not a one hour stop in and out for sure. Enjoy everything that history has to offer.

I this review was helpful please let me know.

title: Another must see when in Greece.
text:
We came we saw we conquered. Amazing site but be patience with the crowds. They want to have fun too. The history is truly amazing here. Don't forget to visit the museum below it is well worth the $$$

I this review was helpful please let me know.

title: Another do not miss
text: So much history in these ruins. Will be hot if in summer time bring water and good walking shoes but have a good time.

title: What a site to behold
text: I will never forget this tour as long as I live. Pure magic... I advise to go with a tour and get the early entry. This way to can get to the special sites before the big crowds do.

title: The way to go
text: If you are going to See the sites book with this team. The guides know their stuff and things you would never know. Don't forget to tip your guide.

title: Magical
text: We did the tourist thing and threw the coins in the fountain. We had such a wonderful romantic trip.

title: A must see sight!
text: I advise to get reservations for a tour and get in behind the scenes so much to miss on your own. I still cant believe I was here.

title: Don't miss!
text: We visited this site on an anniversary trip. Loved the history! Was everything we imagined and more. Well worth your time.

title: WOW What a stay
text:
We stay here four nights in preparation for a 10 day cruise to celebrate our anniversary. We absolutely loved our stay. Treated like royalty 100% of the time. Breakfast was outstanding and we were upgraded on our room so we faced the town. What a wonderful stay. WE can't wait to come back.

Make sure to use your AAA card for discounts...

If you found this helpful please let me know!
place: Rome Cavalieri, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel

title: Sweet Made to order!
text: Sweet ice cream cool concept made to order Ice Cream. Give them a try you definitely wont be sorry!! We loved this place and keep coming back for more.

title: Nice Romantic Get Away but...
text:
We had a nice couple of nights but very noisy. We have stayed here a couple of times in the past as a weekend escape but it seems a litter noisier than in the past. The Hotel is getting a little tired but still worth the stay. The staff. What happened you all used to greet us and be so friendly. Seems like you don't appreciate my business? Overall the stay is nice and my wife loves the shopping location and coming back to the room to relax. You will enjoy your stay if you love to shop this is the place to stay.

Make sure to use your AAA card for discounts...

If you found this helpful please let me know!

title: Beautiful View
text: Loved the view a little cramped but the food is great. We continue to stop in and just chill and relax.

title: Fun but the air is filled with a BUZZ
text: A very young atmosphere lots of noise and hustle and bustle but you have to give it a try if you are here.

title: Very Nice Indeed!
text:
We stayed here for a birthday party in a nearby town and had a great stay. We stayed on the top floor and as Hilton Gold members we were treated like royalty. Thank you so much for a great stay and very nice room with a view from the top! Can't wait to come back for another stay. Rooms were nice and clean, Front desk staff VERY friendly and accommodating. Seriously our stay couldn't have been any better! This is the place to stay if you are in the area!

Make sure to use your AAA card for discounts if you are not a Hilton card member.

If you found this helpful please let me know!
place: The Duniway Portland, a Hilton Hotel

title: Great afternoon lunch!
text: Some friends from the area highly recommended this restaurant but said you must have reservations. My wife made reservations for lunch and we were not disappointed. The service was very upscale and the food was AWESOME indeed! Give them a try... Make sure to have reservations and enjoy the view of Oregon from the 30th floor.

title: Great food!
text: We ate breakfast here on our last day of our stay... We should of eaten here every morning. The food was that good. Service was a little on the weak side not sure why but overall food was great!

title: DO NOT STAY HERE!!! HORRIBLE
text:
My wife and I sold our house and had to stay here for three days... Trust the bad reviews on this place. The room we got had a stench that was terrible and the front desk wouldn't change our room. I had to go to the local Home Depot to get something to spray on the carpets... Oh did I mention carpets? FILTHY! Honestly this had to be the worst experience I have ever had at a hotel. This is not to put the other chain down that ends with a 6 but this place makes staying at M6 feel like a 5 star resort. Upon checkout we had to go to a laundromat and wash all of our clothes to get the smell out and then spray down our suitcases. The front desk was not help at all. Also the battery died in the wall thermostat and nobody had batteries. I went and purchased my own batteries for the thermostat. I think the good reviews are a hoax on this place. Do yourself a big favor stay far away from this place.

If you've found this review helpful please let me know!
place: Extended Stay America - San Jose - Morgan Hill

title: Great place to stay in Yuba City
text:
We stayed here cause we are Hilton members and we keep coming back because we love this place. Good, Clean, Comfortable... The front desk staff is friendly and accommodating. We just bought a house in the area and we have stayed here on almost every visit while the house construction is being done. You won't be sorry if you book a room here. Seriously cannot say enough good about the Hampton Yuba City. You will love this place too.

If you've found this review helpful please let me know!

title: Very nice and Clean Place to Stay
text:
We decided to give this place a try due to the moderate price. We have not been sorry! We usually stay at the Hampton next door but we have spent so much time in Hotels we thought we would save a little $$$ by staying here. Great place to stay moderately priced for a good clean comfortable room. The front desk staff has been great and Robin was very helpful for being brand new. He hand carried some extra towels to my room instead of making me go to the front desk. Thank you Robin!!

Overall if you are looking to save a little $$ but looking for a great place to stay look no further you have found your place in Yuba City.

If you've found this review helpful please let me know!

title: Great Breakfast!
text: This has to be one of our favorite breakfast places in town. I look forward to a visit anytime we are in town.

title: Fantastic Food!
text: Being new to the area didn't know what to expect when we walked in. Nice place and the food is fantastic! My wife loved the decor... Overall the food was great with an Italian spin. What is not to like! We will be back very soon!!

title: Quick visit with Friends
text:
We pop in here for a visit hoping for a great steak dinner. Without disappointment dinner was a success. Great dinning experience with a side of quirky. The waitstaff was on target and the food was great. We have been here twice with some friends and everyone's meal was great. Give a try you won't be disappointed.

If you've found this review helpful please let me know!

title: The sandwiches are fantastic
text:
If you are looking for a good quick sandwich look no further. We have been here twice and both times the sandwiches were on point. It is a great deli sandwich place that is worth the time to visit. You really won't be disappointed.

If you've found this review helpful please let me know!

title: Mixed about this place.
text:
We visited this place with the grand kiddos... The service was decent and the food was just OK. Really cannot complain too much the kids were happy. The area was a little shady with homeless in the area. Overall if you are looking for an Applebee's fix you found it here.

If you've found this review helpful please let me know!

title: Panera Bread Fix Here
text:
You can get your Panera Bread fix here. If you like Panera this location will scratch your itch. Great fresh food in the PB style. We love to visit this place for a nice healthy lunch.

If you've found this review helpful please let me know!

title: It was OK nothing more
text:
We stayed here for a quick overnight get away and as a Silver member expected a a little better. Asked to be upgraded to a higher floor with a city view. Yeah right All I got was a view of the roof on the Convention center. Really? Overall the room was decent cleaning could have been a little better and the hotel needs some TLC. Would we stay again. Maybe... Make sure to use your AAA card for discounts if you are not a Hilton card member.

If you found this helpful please let me know!

title: Pretty nice and treated Well.
text:
We traveled here for a family gathering. Booked a room ahead of time and we were greeted fast and friendly by the front desk staff. The room was nice clean and everything you would expect from a Hilton. Breakfast was decent great selection of all the usual suspects and satisfying for the days adventure. Would we stay here again. YES in a heartbeat!

If you've found this review helpful please let me know!

title: Not So good
text: My wife was traveling on business and thought this would be an OK place to stay. For a woman traveling single this is not the place to stay. The area is shady and some of the people around here are too. The front desk was friendly enough but she won't be staying here again.
place: Red Roof Inn Phoenix North - Bell Road

title: Romantic Get Away
text: Great place for a nice romantic getaway. Booked this place on a Thursday night got a great room that overlooked the beach across the street and the sound of the crashing waves all night long was AWESOME. Overall the room was a little tired but easy to overlook due the location and the view. Front desk staff was a little distracted but did take care of us right away. Overall would I stay here again? Sure would and sometime very soon!

title: Not Bad for a Last Minute Stay
text:
We were traveling over presidents day weekend without reservations... Tried to stay a Marriotts but they were booked for the night but suggested the Residence in across the parking lot. Reception was very friendly by the front desk staff. Once we got to the room it wasn't too bad and it took care of our needs for the night. The area seemed safe and clean. The Breakfast was nothing to write home about bare minimum was offered a very small step above continental. Overall would I stay again. If I had to it wouldn't be a problem but not my first choice.

If you find this review helpful please let me know! Happy Travels.

title: Great Steak...
text: Had a hankering for a nice steak. This place fill the spot. We had a hard time throwing the peanut shells on the floor but when in Rome. The food way good moderately inexpensive and family fun environment. Service was good very attentive. Overall a great experience and We would go back without question.

title: Fun Quirky Place for a Great Dinner
text:
We were looking for a decent meal while traveling through Vacaville and my wife found this place on one of her apps. We had a slight wait but it was worth the wait. Great server very attentive and the meal was fantastic! We can hardly wait to come back when we travel through the area again.

If you found this review helpful please let me know! Happy dinning!

title: What a steak
text:
Ate here for the second time and food was just as good as the first time. Inside is a little small and the staff makes you feel like family. Both times I had the steak and it was wonderful! My wife had the chicken pasta and loved it!

Let me know if this review was helpful.

title: Great Flight and On Time
text: Great Friendly Crew took care of us on the way to Maui no problems and did make me feel like a second class person when I had to use the first class restroom.

title: Great Flight Home
text: We had a great flight home the stewardess was so friendly and it was refreshing to talk to them and find out they were in Maui for a couple of days too. Great flight crew indeed!
